page.title: 09LIVING IN CHURCH STRETTON
page.content:
I think{Church Stretton}is a nice place to live. There are plenty of walks and it attracts lots of tourists every year. The views are very nice all the year round. The hills look especially beautiful in the autumn when the trees' leaves change colour. Then it looks like a blanket of many colours. In the winter people say it is {'Little Switzerland'}when snow sparkles on the tops of the hills which seem like mountains. Most of the people are friendly which is very nice. I like going to Church Stretton Primary School because most of my friends go there.
I like living in Church Stretton. I don't think I ever want to move.
